This is The Best FPS on steam hands down! No wonder why it always stays on top of steam stats.
I bought this game when it wasn't free (got a Loyalty Badge thanks Valve hehehe). Now it's free-to-play for everyone, and what does that mean? beware of cheaters!
If you wanna play it clean without cheaters, go get your account primed and you'll be placed with other primed accounts in a match when you matchmake. You can also get your account primed for free once you reach level 21 but it takes a long time and of course you don't wanna waste your time playing against cheaters and lose over and over again forever, do you? The struggle is definitely a lot harder without a primed account.
